recipes.title: Bread sandwich
recipes.method: Put one slice of bread between two other slices of bread. Delicious.

recipes.title: Mashed Potato
recipes.method: Boil them and mash them. Simple. Add cream if you want to get all fancy.

recipes.title: Bangers n Mash
recipes.ingredients:
Sausage
Potato
Gravy
Sense of humour
recipes.method:
Boil and mash the potato.
Cook the sausages
Stick the sausages in the potato
Pour gravy on. Nice.

recipes.title: Burger
recipes.method: Cook beef and put inside the bread.

recipes.title: Fish 'n' Chips
recipes.method:
1 - Batter and fry the fish
2 - slice the potato
3 - fry the potato
4 - put on a plate
5 - Salt 'n' Vinegar to taste

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Sandwich
recipes.method: Slap them in the sammich and stuff it in yer gob

recipes.title: Cake
recipes.ingredients:
Eggs, Flour, Milk, Some other stuff maybe chocolate?
Perhaps?
recipes.method:
Mix it in a bowl,
Put it in the oven,
Serve. It is delicious!
Make chocolate cake, it's the best.

recipes.title: Jambalaya
recipes.ingredients:
Rice,
Sausage,
Capsicum Pepper,
Whatever you have lying about the kitchen.
recipes.method:
Cook the meat,
Cook the veg,
Put the rice in the pot,
Throw everything else in,
Make sure to use lots of cajun spices.

recipes.title: Ham Sandwich
recipes.method:
Get two slices of bread
Butter each slice of bread
Get a slice of ham and put it on top of one slice of bread
Put the other slice of bread on top of the first slice of bread
Easy peasy innit

recipes.title: Smashed Chicken
recipes.method:
Batter the Chicken
Fry the Chicken
Serve with Rice
Have lots of Chili

recipes.title: Cheese on Toast
recipes.method:
Put toast in toaster
(optional) Put the ham on the toast
When done put the cheese on the toast (on top of the ham if you did that step first)
Whack it under the grill for a couple minutes.

recipes.title: Kaya Toast
recipes.method:
Toast the Toast
Add butter
Half Boil eggs
Serve
